name: The World of Wox Runn: Part 1
name_original: The World of Wox Runn: Part 1
description:
From the creators of Wox Runn 1,Wox Runn 2 and Wox Runn Lite: The World of Wox Runn.

Remember Wox Runn 1,2 and Lite? Well here is The World of Wox Runn: Part 1!

This game continues off the final level in Wox Runn 1 before the "You Win!" Level. As it is a Sequence of Wox Runn 1.

Same with all the other parts of The World of Wox Runn: Part 1,2,3,4,5,6,7 and so on.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS:

Game Maker: Runn.Guy and Codeiverse | Developers: Codeiverse, Runn.Guy,Blocky,Annoying Pig and Wox | Main Developers: Codeiverse and Runn.Guy | Lead Developer: Codeiverse | Art: Flowlab and Wox | Level Design: Annoying Pig | Coders: Blocky,Annoying Pig,Codeiverse and Runn.guy | Ideas: Runn.Guy | Finishing Touches: Runn.Guy,Codeiverse and Wox | Publishing: Codeiverse and Annoying Pig | Sounds: Wox and Flowlab |

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We hope you enjoy this Game! And sorry if it is Short. We are Currently working on the Second Part of the game too and this part was made in 1 Hour and 30 Mins.
